message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 represents a fair price for its value, I'm willing to come down to $170. I'm confident you'll find this to be a reasonable offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $80 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend.
